meanings.definition: To make a choice or decision
meanings.sent1: I will opt for the blue shirt today.
meanings.sent2: She decided to opt for the healthier option on the menu.
meanings.sent3: After much thought, he will opt for the chocolate cake instead of the pie.
meanings.sent4: In the game of life, you must opt wisely for your next move.
meanings.sent5: When faced with a dilemma, always opt for kindness.

meanings.definition: To choose or select from among alternatives
meanings.sent1: You can opt to take the stairs or the elevator.
meanings.sent2: They opted for the red car instead of the blue one.
meanings.sent3: The cat will opt to sleep in the sunbeam rather than the shade.
meanings.sent4: She opted for the scenic route to enjoy the beautiful views.
meanings.sent5: When shopping, always opt for quality over quantity.
